isPageScroll.description: The scrolling method is page scrolling, and if the component is used as an overlay, this parameter must be set to false
isPageScroll.description_zh: 滚动方式为页面滚动，若组件作为浮层使用，该参数需设为 false

needToolbar.description: Whether you need a bottom toolbar, if you use a developer-defined bottom toolbar, this parameter needs to be set to false
needToolbar.description_zh: 是否需要底部 toolbar，若使用开发者自定义的底部 toolbar，该参数需设为 false

needLikeBtn.description: Whether you want the Like button of the parent comment at the top of the details is displayed by default
needLikeBtn.description_zh: 是否需要详情顶部父级评论的点赞按钮，默认显示

backListAfterDelete.description: Whether to return a list item after deleting details is a one-stop logic by default. If you are using an overlay, set the change property to false
backListAfterDelete.description_zh: 删除详情后是否返回列表项，默认一站式逻辑。若使用浮层，请设置改属性为 false

addComment.description: Used to bring up the comment publisher to post a comment
addComment.description_zh: 用于调起评论发布器发布评论

onDelete.description: Triggered when the overall details are deleted, the returned data is {status, data:{srid}}
onDelete.description_zh: 删除整体详情内容时触发，返回数据为{status, data:{srid}}

onReply.description: Triggered when a comment is successfully published, the return data is {status, data:{srid}}
onReply.description_zh: 评论发布成功时触发，返回数据为 {status, data:{srid}}
